Title: IIS Simple Control Panel
Description: This utility is a small and simple controller for IIS Websites and Application Pools, it allows you to start, stop, or recycle IIS objects en masse.
HomeWiki:
IIS Simple CPanel

This was an experiment for myself in using the Microsoft.Web.Administration extension. This utility allows you to do the following:
  • Export a list of all sites and application pools
  • Start or stop all available IIS websites with a single click
  • Start, Stop, or Recycle all available IIS application pools with a single click
  • Start or Stop specific websites
  • Start, Stop, or Recycle specific Application Pools
  • IISSCPanel automatically fetches all websites/app pools from IIS, allowing you to perform batch actions within 1 or 2 clicks
  • Tiny stand-alone application 1x exectuable.

Interface
